◆ GetLocalTransform()

Vector3 BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.GetLocalTransform ( MouseEventArgs  e,
ModelPanelViewport  viewport,
Matrix  localTransform,
Matrix  invLocalTransform,
Matrix  localParentTransform,
SelectionParams  selection,
out Vector3?  worldPoint 
)
inlineprivate
264  {
265  worldPoint = null;
266 
267  if (GetTransformPoint(new Vector2(e.X, e.Y), out Vector3 point, viewport, localTransform, selection))
268  {
269  Vector3 transform = new Vector3(), lPoint;
270 
271  CoordinateType coord = _coordinateTypes[(int) ControlType];
272  switch (ControlType)
273  {
274  case TransformType.Rotation:
275 
276  lPoint = invLocalTransform * point;
277 
278  if (selection._lastPointLocal == lPoint)
279  {
280  return new Vector3();
281  }
282 
283  //Get matrix with new rotation applied
284  Matrix m = localParentTransform * Matrix.AxisAngleMatrix(selection._lastPointLocal, lPoint);
285 
286  //Derive angles from matrices, get difference
287  transform = (m.GetAngles() - localParentTransform.GetAngles()).RemappedToRange(-180.0f, 180.0f);
288 
289  break;
290 
291  case TransformType.Translation:
292  case TransformType.Scale:
293 
294  if (ControlType == TransformType.Scale &&
295  selection._snapX &&
296  selection._snapY &&
297  selection._snapZ)
298  {
299  //Get scale factor
300  //TODO: calculate with distance between screen points instead
301  transform = new Vector3((point / selection._lastPointWorld)._y);
302  break;
303  }
304 
305  lPoint = invLocalTransform * point;
306 
307  if (selection._lastPointLocal == lPoint)
308  {
309  return new Vector3();
310  }
311 
312  if (!(ControlType == TransformType.Translation && selection._snapCirc))
313  {
314  switch (coord)
315  {
316  case CoordinateType.World:
317 
318  //Limit world point with snaps
319  if (!selection._snapX)
320  {
321  point._x = selection._lastPointWorld._x;
322  }
323 
324  if (!selection._snapY)
325  {
326  point._y = selection._lastPointWorld._y;
327  }
328 
329  if (!selection._snapZ)
330  {
331  point._z = selection._lastPointWorld._z;
332  }
333 
334  //Remake local point with edited world point
335  lPoint = invLocalTransform * point;
336 
337  break;
338  case CoordinateType.Local:
339 
340  //Limit local point with snaps
341  if (!selection._snapX)
342  {
343  lPoint._x = selection._lastPointLocal._x;
344  }
345 
346  if (!selection._snapY)
347  {
348  lPoint._y = selection._lastPointLocal._y;
349  }
350 
351  if (!selection._snapZ)
352  {
353  lPoint._z = selection._lastPointLocal._z;
354  }
355 
356  break;
357  case CoordinateType.Screen:
358 
359  break;
360  }
361  }
362 
363  if (ControlType == TransformType.Scale)
364  {
365  transform = localParentTransform * lPoint /
366  (localParentTransform * selection._lastPointLocal);
367  }
368  else
369  {
370  transform = localParentTransform * lPoint -
371  localParentTransform * selection._lastPointLocal;
372  }
373 
374  break;
375  }
376 
377  worldPoint = point;
378  selection._lastPointWorld = point;
379 
380  return transform;
381  }
382 
383  return new Vector3();
384  }

◆ GetScaleAxes()

◆ GetTransformPoint() [1/2]

bool BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.GetTransformPoint ( Vector2  mousePoint,
out Vector3  point,

Matrix  localTransform,
SelectionParams  selection 
)
inline

Gets world-point of specified mouse point projected onto the selected bone's local space if rotating or in world space if translating or scaling. Intersects the projected ray with the appropriate plane using the snap flags.

1039  {
1040  Vector3 lineStart = panel.UnProject(mousePoint._x, mousePoint._y, 0.0f);
1041  Vector3 lineEnd = panel.UnProject(mousePoint._x, mousePoint._y, 1.0f);
1042  Vector3 center = localTransform.GetPoint();
1043  Vector3 camera = panel.Camera.GetPoint();
1044  Vector3 normal = new Vector3();
1045 
1046  bool axisSnap = selection._snapX || selection._snapY || selection._snapZ;
1047  CoordinateType coord = _coordinateTypes[(int) ControlType];
1048 
1049  switch (ControlType)
1050  {
1051  case TransformType.Rotation:
1052

1054  if (axisSnap)
1055  {
1056  switch (coord)
1057  {
1058  case CoordinateType.Screen:
1059  if (selection._snapX || selection._snapY || selection._snapZ)
1060  {
1061  normal = camera.Normalize(center);
1062  }
1063 
1064  break;
1065  case CoordinateType.Local:
1066  normal = (localTransform * new Vector3(
1067  selection._snapX ? 1.0f : 0.0f,
1068  selection._snapY ? 1.0f : 0.0f,
1069  selection._snapZ ? 1.0f : 0.0f)).Normalize(center);
1070  break;
1071  case CoordinateType.World:
1072  normal = new Vector3(
1073  selection._snapX ? 1.0f : 0.0f,
1074  selection._snapY ? 1.0f : 0.0f,
1075  selection._snapZ ? 1.0f : 0.0f);
1076  break;
1077  }
1078  }
1079  else if (selection._snapCirc)
1080  {
1081  radius *= _circOrbScale;
1082  normal = camera.Normalize(center);
1083  }
1084  else if (Maths.LineSphereIntersect(lineStart, lineEnd, center, radius, out point))
1085  {
1086  return true;
1087  }
1088  else
1089  {
1090  normal = camera.Normalize(center);
1091  }
1092 
1093  if (Maths.LinePlaneIntersect(lineStart, lineEnd, center, normal, out point))
1094  {
1095  point = Maths.PointAtLineDistance(center, point, radius);
1096  return true;
1097  }
1098 
1099  break;
1100 
1101  case TransformType.Translation:
1102  case TransformType.Scale:
1103 
1104  if (axisSnap)
1105  {
1106  if (selection._snapX && selection._snapY && selection._snapZ)
1107  {
1108  normal = Vector3.UnitZ * Matrix.RotationMatrix(panel.Camera._rotation);
1109  }
1110  else
1111  {
1112  switch (coord)
1113  {
1114  case CoordinateType.Screen:
1115  normal = Vector3.UnitZ * Matrix.RotationMatrix(panel.Camera._rotation);
1116  break;
1117  case CoordinateType.Local:
1118  case CoordinateType.World:
1119 
1120  //Remove local rotation

1123  localTransform =

1125  Matrix.ScaleMatrix(localTransform.GetScale());
1126  }
1127 
1128  if (selection._snapX && selection._snapY)
1129  {

1131  }
1132  else if (selection._snapX && selection._snapZ)
1133  {
1134  normal = (localTransform * Vector3.UnitY).Normalize(center);
1135  }
1136  else if (selection._snapY && selection._snapZ)
1137  {
1138  normal = (localTransform * Vector3.UnitX).Normalize(center);
1139  }
1140  else //One of the snaps
1141  {
1142  Vector3 unitSnapAxis = new Vector3(
1143  selection._snapX ? 1.0f : 0.0f,
1144  selection._snapY ? 1.0f : 0.0f,
1145  selection._snapZ ? 1.0f : 0.0f);
1146 
1147  float camDist = camera.TrueDistance(center);

1149  float ratio = camVec.Dot(unitSnapAxis) /
1150  (camVec.TrueDistance() * unitSnapAxis.TrueDistance());
1151  float lineDist = camDist * ratio;
1152  Vector3 endPoint = localTransform * (unitSnapAxis * lineDist);
1153  normal = camera.Normalize(endPoint);
1154  }
1155 
1156  break;
1157  }
1158  }
1159  }
1160  else
1161  {
1162  normal = Vector3.UnitZ * Matrix.RotationMatrix(panel.Camera._rotation);
1163  }
1164 
1165  break;
1166  }
1167

◆ ModelChanged()

◆ modelPanel1_MouseDown()

virtual void BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.modelPanel1_MouseDown ( object  sender,
MouseEventArgs  e 
)
inlineprotectedvirtual
157  {
158  _createdNewBone = false;
159 
160  ModelPanel panel = sender as ModelPanel;
161  ModelPanelViewport viewport = panel.CurrentViewport;
162 
163  if (panel._draggingViewports)
164  {
165  return;
166  }
167 
168  if (e.Button == MouseButtons.Left)
169  {
170  if (DoNotHighlightOnMouseMove)
171  {
172  HighlightStuff(e, panel);
173 
174  //Reset the cursor (HighlightStuff sets the cursor)
175  panel.Cursor = Cursors.Default;
176  }
177 
178  //Reset snap flags
179  _boneSelection.ResetSnaps();
180  _vertexSelection.ResetSnaps();
181 
182  MouseDownTargetBone(e, panel);
183 
184  if (!MouseDownTargetVertex(e, panel))
185  {
186  if (CurrentFrame == 0 &&
187  TargetAnimType == NW4RAnimType.CHR &&
188  CHR0Editor.chkMoveBoneOnly.Checked && TargetModel is MDL0Node)
189  {
190  MDL0Node m = TargetModel as MDL0Node;
191  m._dontUpdateMesh = true;
192  }
193  }
194

196  panel.Invalidate();
197  }

◆ modelPanel1_MouseMove()

virtual void BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.modelPanel1_MouseMove ( object  sender,
MouseEventArgs  e 
)
inlineprotectedvirtual

Reimplemented in BrawlCrate.UI.Model_Previewer.ModelEditControl.ModelEditControl.

448  {
449  if (_playing)
450  {
451  return;
452  }
453 
454  ModelPanel panel = sender as ModelPanel;
455  ModelPanelViewport viewport = panel.CurrentViewport;
456 
457  Vector3? point;
458  if (_boneSelection.IsMoving() && SelectedBone != null)
459  {
460  Vector3 transform = GetLocalTransform(e, viewport,
461  GetBoneWorldMtx(),
462  GetBoneInvWorldMtx(),
463  GetBoneParentTransformMtx(),
464  _boneSelection,
465  out point);
466 
467  if (Alt && !_createdNewBone)
468  {
469  if (SelectedBone is MDL0BoneNode)
470  {
471  _createdNewBone = true;
472 
473  MDL0BoneNode b = SelectedBone as MDL0BoneNode;
474  MDL0Node model = b.Model;
475  MDL0BoneNode newBone = new MDL0BoneNode();
476  string name = "NewBone";
477  if (model != null)
478  {
479  name += "0";
480  int id = 1;
481  Top:
482  foreach (MDL0BoneNode x in model._linker.BoneCache)
483  {
484  if (x.Name == name)
485  {
486  name = "NewBone" + id++;
487  goto Top;
488  }
489  }
490 
491  newBone._entryIndex = model._linker.BoneCache.Length;
492  }
493 
494  newBone.Name = name;
495  newBone.FrameState = newBone.BindState = FrameState.Neutral;
496 
497  b.AddChild(newBone);
498 
499  newBone.RecalcFrameState();
500  newBone.RecalcBindState(false, false, false);
501 
502  model?._linker.RegenerateBoneCache();
503  BonesPanel?.Reset();
504 
505  SelectedBone = newBone;
506  }
507  }
508 
509  if (point != null)
510  {
511  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
512  {
513  _boneTransform[(int) ControlType](i, transform[i]);
514  }
515 
516  _boneSelection._lastPointLocal = GetBoneInvWorldMtx() * point.Value;
517  }
518  }
519 
520  if (_vertexSelection.IsMoving() && VertexLoc != null)
521  {
522  Vector3 center = VertexLoc.Value;
523  Vector3 transform = GetLocalTransform(e, viewport,
524  Matrix.TranslationMatrix(center),
525  Matrix.TranslationMatrix(-center),
526  Matrix.Identity,
527  _vertexSelection,
528  out point);
529 
530  if (point != null)
531  {
532  switch (ControlType)
533  {
534  case TransformType.Scale:
535  foreach (Vertex3 vertex in _selectedVertices)
536  {
537  vertex.WeightedPosition =
538  Maths.ScaleAboutPoint(vertex.WeightedPosition, center, transform);
539  }
540 
541  break;
542 
543  case TransformType.Rotation:
544  foreach (Vertex3 vertex in _selectedVertices)
545  {
546  vertex.WeightedPosition =
547  Maths.RotateAboutPoint(vertex.WeightedPosition, center, transform);
548  }
549 
550  break;
551 
552  case TransformType.Translation:
553  foreach (Vertex3 vertex in _selectedVertices)
554  {
555  vertex.WeightedPosition += transform;
556  }
557 
558  break;
559  }
560 
561  _vertexLoc = null;
562  _vertexSelection._lastPointLocal = Matrix.TranslationMatrix(-VertexLoc.Value) * point.Value;
563  }
564 
565  UpdateModel();
566  }
567 
568  bool allowHighlight = !DoNotHighlightOnMouseMove;
569  bool draggingSelection = viewport.Selecting;
570 
571  //if not dragging a point AND (highlighting is allowed, or not but selecting)
572  if (!_boneSelection.IsMoving() &&
573  !_vertexSelection.IsMoving() &&
574  (allowHighlight || !allowHighlight && draggingSelection))
575  {
576  HighlightStuff(e, panel);
577  }
578  }

◆ MouseDownTargetBone()

void BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.MouseDownTargetBone ( MouseEventArgs  e,
ModelPanel  panel 
)
inlineprivate
18  {
19  //Re-target selected bone
20  if (SelectedBone != null)
21  {
22  _boneSelection.ApplySnaps();
23 
24  //Targeting functions are done in HighlightStuff
25  if (!_boneSelection.SnappingAny() && !_boneSelection._hiSphere)
26  {
27  //Orb selection missed. Assign bone and move to next step.
28  if (_hiVertex == null && !Ctrl)
29  {
30  SelectedBone = null;
31  }
32 
33  goto GetBone;
34  }
35 
36  //Bone re-targeted. Get frame values and local point aligned to snapping plane.
37  if (GetTransformPoint(new Vector2(e.X, e.Y), out Vector3 point, panel.CurrentViewport,
38  GetBoneWorldMtx(), _boneSelection))
39  {
40  _boneSelection.Update(ControlType, point, GetBoneInvWorldMtx() * point, SelectedBone.FrameState);
41  if (_boneSelection.IsMoving())
42  {
43  BoneChange(SelectedBone);
44  }
45 
46  panel.CurrentViewport.AllowSelection = false;
47  }
48  }
49 
50  GetBone:
51 
52  //Try selecting new bone
53  if (SelectedBone == null && panel.RenderBones)
54  {
55  SelectedBone = _hiBone;
56  }
57  }

◆ MouseDownTargetVertex()

bool BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.MouseDownTargetVertex ( MouseEventArgs  e,
ModelPanel  panel 
)
inline
60  {
61  bool ok = false;
62 
63  //Re-target selected vertex
64  if (VertexLoc.HasValue)
65  {
66  _vertexSelection.ApplySnaps();
67 
68  if (!_vertexSelection.SnappingAny() && !_vertexSelection._hiSphere)
69  {
70  if (NotCtrlAlt && SelectedBone == null)
71  {
72  ClearSelectedVertices();
73  }
74 
75  ok = true;
76  goto GetVertex;
77  }
78 
79  //Vertex re-targeted. Get translation and point (aligned to snapping plane).
80  if (GetTransformPoint(new Vector2(e.X, e.Y), out Vector3 point, panel.CurrentViewport, VertexLoc.Value,
81  _vertexSelection))
82  {
83  panel.CurrentViewport.AllowSelection = false;
84  _vertexSelection.Update(ControlType, point, point * Matrix.TranslationMatrix(-VertexLoc.Value),
85  Vector3.Zero, VertexLoc.Value, Vector3.One);
86  if (_vertexSelection.IsMoving())
87  {
88  VertexChange(_selectedVertices);
89  }
90  }
91  }
92  else
93  {
94  ok = true;
95  }
96 
97  if (!ok)
98  {
99  return true;
100  }
101 
102  GetVertex:
103 
104  bool verticesChanged = false;
105  if (ok)
106  {
107  if (_hiVertex != null)
108  {
109  if (Ctrl)
110  {
111  if (!_selectedVertices.Contains(_hiVertex))
112  {
113  SelectVertex(_hiVertex, true);
114  verticesChanged = true;
115  }
116  else
117  {
118  SelectVertex(_hiVertex, false);
119  verticesChanged = true;
120  }
121  }
122  else if (Alt)
123  {
124  if (_selectedVertices.Contains(_hiVertex))
125  {
126  SelectVertex(_hiVertex, false);
127  verticesChanged = true;
128  }
129  }
130  else
131  {
132  ClearSelectedVertices();
133  if (_hiVertex != null)
134  {
135  SelectVertex(_hiVertex, true);
136  verticesChanged = true;
137  }
138  }
139  }
140  else if (NotCtrlAlt && SelectedBone == null)
141  {
142  ClearSelectedVertices();
143  }
144 
145  if (verticesChanged)
146  {
147  OnSelectedVerticesChanged();
148  }
149  }
150 
151  return verticesChanged;
152  }

◆ MouseMoveTarget()

void BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.MouseMoveTarget ( ModelPanel  panel,
MouseEventArgs  e,
float  depth,
ModelPanelViewport  v,
Matrix  transformMatrix,
Matrix  invTransformMatrix,
SelectionParams  selection 
)
inlineprivate
636  {
637  if (ControlType == TransformType.None)
638  {
639  return;
640  }
641 
642  CoordinateType coord = _coordinateTypes[(int) ControlType];
643 
644  //Get the location of the bone
645  Vector3 center = transformMatrix.GetPoint();
646 
647  //Standard radius scaling snippet. This is used for orb scaling depending on camera distance.
648  float radius = CamDistance(center, v);
649 
650  bool snapFound = false;
651  if (ControlType == TransformType.Rotation)
652  {
653  //Get point projected onto our orb.
654  Vector3 point = v.ProjectCameraSphere(new Vector2(e.X, e.Y), center, radius, false);
655 
656  //Get the distance of the mouse point from the bone
657  float distance = point.TrueDistance(center);
658 
659  if (Math.Abs(distance - radius) < radius * _selectOrbScale) //Point lies within orb radius
660  {
661  selection._hiSphere = true;
662 
663  //Determine axis snapping
664  Vector3 angles = (invTransformMatrix * point).GetAngles() * Maths._rad2degf;
665  angles._x = Math.Abs(angles._x);
666  angles._y = Math.Abs(angles._y);
667  angles._z = Math.Abs(angles._z);
668 
669  if (Math.Abs(angles._y - 90.0f) <= _axisSnapRange)
670  {
671  selection._hiX = true;
672  }
673  else if (angles._x >= 180.0f - _axisSnapRange || angles._x <= _axisSnapRange)
674  {
675  selection._hiY = true;
676  }
677  else if (angles._y >= 180.0f - _axisSnapRange || angles._y <= _axisSnapRange)
678  {
679  selection._hiZ = true;
680  }
681  }
682  else if (Math.Abs(distance - radius * _circOrbScale) < radius * _selectOrbScale
683  ) //Point lies on circ line
684  {
685  selection._hiCirc = true;
686  }
687 
688  if (selection._hiX || selection._hiY || selection._hiZ || selection._hiCirc)
689  {
690  snapFound = true;
691  }
692  }
693  else if (ControlType == TransformType.Translation || ControlType == TransformType.Scale)
694  {
695  //No more need to use depth!!! Just some nice math
696 
697  if (_coordinateTypes[(int) ControlType] == CoordinateType.World)
698  {
699  transformMatrix = Matrix.TranslationMatrix(center) * Matrix.ScaleMatrix(transformMatrix.GetScale());
700  }
701 
702  Vector3[] planePoints = new Vector3[3]; //xy, yz, xz
703  v.ProjectCameraPlanes(new Vector2(e.X, e.Y), transformMatrix,
704  out planePoints[0], out planePoints[1], out planePoints[2]);
705 
706  List<Vector3> testDiffs = new List<Vector3>();
707  foreach (Vector3 planePoint in planePoints)
708  {
709  Vector3 d =
710  coord == CoordinateType.World ? (planePoint - center) / radius :
711  coord == CoordinateType.Local ? invTransformMatrix * planePoint / radius :
712  (panel.Camera._matrix * planePoint - panel.Camera._matrix * center) / radius;
713 
714  if (d._x > -_axisSelectRange && d._x < _axisLDist + 0.01f &&
715  d._y > -_axisSelectRange && d._y < _axisLDist + 0.01f &&
716  d._z > -_axisSelectRange && d._z < _axisLDist + 0.01f)
717  {
718  testDiffs.Add(d);
719  }
720  }
721 
722  //Check if point lies on a specific axis
723  foreach (Vector3 diff in testDiffs)
724  {
725  float errorRange = _axisSelectRange;
726 
727  if (diff._x > _axisHalfLDist &&
728  Math.Abs(diff._y) < errorRange &&
729  Math.Abs(diff._z) < errorRange)
730  {
731  selection._hiX = true;
732  }
733 
734  if (diff._y > _axisHalfLDist &&
735  Math.Abs(diff._x) < errorRange &&
736  Math.Abs(diff._z) < errorRange)
737  {
738  selection._hiY = true;
739  }
740 
741  if (diff._z > _axisHalfLDist &&
742  Math.Abs(diff._x) < errorRange &&
743  Math.Abs(diff._y) < errorRange)
744  {
745  selection._hiZ = true;
746  }
747 
748  if (snapFound = selection._hiX || selection._hiY || selection._hiZ)
749  {
750  break;
751  }
752  }
753 
754  if (!snapFound)
755  {
756  foreach (Vector3 diff in testDiffs)
757  {
758  if (ControlType == TransformType.Translation)
759  {
760  if (diff._x < _axisHalfLDist &&
761  diff._y < _axisHalfLDist &&
762  diff._z < _axisHalfLDist)
763  {
764  //Point lies inside the double drag areas
765  if (diff._x > _axisSelectRange)
766  {
767  selection._hiX = true;
768  }
769 
770  if (diff._y > _axisSelectRange)
771  {
772  selection._hiY = true;
773  }
774 
775  if (diff._z > _axisSelectRange)
776  {
777  selection._hiZ = true;
778  }
779 
780  selection._hiCirc =
781  !selection._hiX &&
782  !selection._hiY &&
783  !selection._hiZ;
784 
785  snapFound = true;
786  }
787  }
788  else if (ControlType == TransformType.Scale)
789  {
790  //Determine if the point is in the double or triple drag triangles
791  float halfDist = _scaleHalf2LDist;
792  float centerDist = _scaleHalf1LDist;
793  if (diff.IsInTriangle(new Vector3(), new Vector3(halfDist, 0, 0),
794  new Vector3(0, halfDist, 0)))
795  {
796  if (diff.IsInTriangle(new Vector3(), new Vector3(centerDist, 0, 0),
797  new Vector3(0, centerDist, 0)))
798  {
799  selection._hiX = selection._hiY = selection._hiZ = true;
800  }
801  else
802  {
803  selection._hiX = selection._hiY = true;
804  }
805  }
806  else if (diff.IsInTriangle(new Vector3(), new Vector3(halfDist, 0, 0),
807  new Vector3(0, 0, halfDist)))
808  {
809  if (diff.IsInTriangle(new Vector3(), new Vector3(centerDist, 0, 0),
810  new Vector3(0, 0, centerDist)))
811  {
812  selection._hiX = selection._hiY = selection._hiZ = true;
813  }
814  else
815  {
816  selection._hiX = selection._hiZ = true;
817  }
818  }
819  else if (diff.IsInTriangle(new Vector3(), new Vector3(0, halfDist, 0),
820  new Vector3(0, 0, halfDist)))
821  {
822  if (diff.IsInTriangle(new Vector3(), new Vector3(0, centerDist, 0),
823  new Vector3(0, 0, centerDist)))
824  {
825  selection._hiX = selection._hiY = selection._hiZ = true;
826  }
827  else
828  {
829  selection._hiY = selection._hiZ = true;
830  }
831  }
832 
833  snapFound = selection._hiX || selection._hiY || selection._hiZ;
834  }
835 
836  if (snapFound)
837  {
838  break;
839  }
840  }
841  }
842  }
843 
844  if (snapFound)
845  {
846  panel.Cursor = Cursors.Hand;
847  panel.Invalidate();
848  }
849  }

1306  elevation = lightPos._z.RemapToRange(-180.0f, 180.0f);
1307

1311  elevation = 0;

1338  GL.Vertex2(Math.Cos((x + 0.1f + i) * Maths._deg2radf), Math.Sin((x + 0.1f + i) * Maths._deg2radf));
1339  }
1340 
1341  GL.End();

1344  {
1345  GL.Rotate(-180.0f, 1, 0, 0);
1346  }
1347

1349  GL.Rotate(90.0f, 0, 0, 1);
1350  GL.Rotate(180.0f, 1, 0, 0);
1351  GL.Rotate(90.0f - azimuth, 0, 1, 0);

1354

◆ ProcessKeyPreview()

override bool BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.ProcessKeyPreview ( ref Message  m)
inlineprotected

This handles all key input in the main control instead of through child controls. If you want a hotkey to work only when a specific control is focused, use the control's 'Focused' bool in the hotkey's function.

41  {
42  const int WM_KEYDOWN = 0x100;
43  const int WM_KEYUP = 0x101;
44  //const int WM_CHAR = 0x102;
45  //const int WM_SYSCHAR = 0x106;
46  const int WM_SYSKEYDOWN = 0x104;
47  const int WM_SYSKEYUP = 0x105;
48  //const int WM_IME_CHAR = 0x286;
49 
50  bool down = m.Msg == WM_KEYDOWN || m.Msg == WM_SYSKEYDOWN;
51  bool up = m.Msg == WM_KEYUP || m.Msg == WM_SYSKEYUP;
52 
53  if (down || up)
54  {
55  Keys key;
56  if (m.Msg == WM_SYSKEYDOWN || m.Msg == WM_SYSKEYUP)
57  {
58  key = ModifierKeys;
59  }
60  else
61  {
62  key = (Keys) m.WParam;
63  if (Ctrl)
64  {
65  key |= Keys.Control;
66  }
67 
68  if (Alt)
69  {
70  key |= Keys.Alt;
71  }
72 
73  if (Shift)
74  {
75  key |= Keys.Shift;
76  }
77  }
78 
79  if (down && _hotKeysDown.ContainsKey(key))
80  {
81  if ((bool) _hotKeysDown[key].DynamicInvoke())
82  {
83  return true;
84  }
85  }
86  else if (_hotKeysUp.ContainsKey(key))
87  {
88  if ((bool) _hotKeysUp[key].DynamicInvoke())
89  {
90  return true;
91  }
92  }
93  }
94 
95  return base.ProcessKeyPreview(ref m);
96  }

◆ RenderToGIF()

void BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.RenderToGIF ( List< Image >  images,
string  path 
)
inlineprivate
308  {
309  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(path))
310  {
311  return;
312  }
313 
314  string outPath = "";
315  try
316  {
317  outPath = path;
318  if (!Directory.Exists(outPath))
319  {
320  Directory.CreateDirectory(outPath);
321  }
322 
323  DirectoryInfo dir = new DirectoryInfo(outPath);
324  FileInfo[] files = dir.GetFiles();
325  int i = 0;
326  string name = "Animation";
327  Top:
328  foreach (FileInfo f in files)
329  {
330  if (f.Name == name + i + ".gif")
331  {
332  i++;
333  goto Top;
334  }
335  }
336 
337  outPath += "\\" + name + i + ".gif";
338  }
339  catch
340  {
341  // ignored
342  }
343 
344  AnimatedGifEncoder e = new AnimatedGifEncoder();
345  e.Start(outPath);
346  e.SetDelay(1000 / (int) PlaybackPanel.numFPS.Value);
347  e.SetRepeat(0);
348  e.SetQuality(10);
349  using (ProgressWindow progress = new ProgressWindow(this, "GIF Encoder", "Encoding, please wait...", true))
350  {
351  progress.TopMost = true;
352  progress.Begin(0, images.Count, 0);
353  for (int i = 0, count = images.Count; i < count; i++)
354  {
355  if (progress.Cancelled)
356  {
357  break;
358  }
359 
360  //GIF transparency support is pretty poor, flickers a lot
361  //e.SetTransparent(ModelPanel.CurrentViewport.BackgroundColor);
362 
363  e.AddFrame(images[i]);
364  progress.Update(progress.CurrentValue + 1);
365  }
366 
367  progress.Finish();
368  e.Finish();
369  }
370 
371  _loop = PlaybackPanel.chkLoop.Checked;
372 
373  if (MessageBox.Show(this,
374  "Animated GIF successfully saved to \"" + outPath.Replace("\\", "/") + "\".\nOpen the folder now?",
375  "GIF saved", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo) == DialogResult.Yes)
376  {
377  Process.Start("explorer.exe", path);
378  }
379  }

◆ SaveBitmap()

void BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.SaveBitmap ( Bitmap  bmp,
string  path,
string  extension 
)
inlineprotected
382  {
383  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(path))
384  {
385  path = Application.StartupPath + "\\ScreenCaptures";
386  }
387 
388  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(extension))
389  {
390  extension = ".png";
391  }
392 
393  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(path) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(extension))
394  {
395  try
396  {
397  string outPath = path;
398  if (!Directory.Exists(outPath))
399  {
400  Directory.CreateDirectory(outPath);
401  }
402 
403  DirectoryInfo dir = new DirectoryInfo(outPath);
404  FileInfo[] files = dir.GetFiles();
405  int i = 0;
406  string name = "ScreenCapture";
407  Top:
408  foreach (FileInfo f in files)
409  {
410  if (f.Name == name + i + extension)
411  {
412  i++;
413  goto Top;
414  }
415  }
416 
417  outPath += "\\" + name + i + extension;
418  bool okay = true;
419  if (extension.Equals(".png", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))
420  {
421  bmp.Save(outPath, ImageFormat.Png);
422  }
423  else if (extension.Equals(".tga", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))
424  {
425  bmp.SaveTGA(outPath);
426  }
427  else if (extension.Equals(".tiff", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) ||
428  extension.Equals(".tif", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))
429  {
430  bmp.Save(outPath, ImageFormat.Tiff);
431  }
432  else if (extension.Equals(".bmp", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))
433  {
434  bmp.Save(outPath, ImageFormat.Bmp);
435  }
436  else if (extension.Equals(".jpg", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) ||
437  outPath.EndsWith(".jpeg", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))
438  {
439  bmp.Save(outPath, ImageFormat.Jpeg);
440  }
441  else if (extension.Equals(".gif", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))
442  {
443  bmp.Save(outPath, ImageFormat.Gif);
444  }
445  else
446  {
447  okay = false;
448  }
449 
450  if (okay)
451  {
452  if (MessageBox.Show(this,
453  "Screenshot successfully saved to \"" + outPath.Replace("\\", "/") +
454  "\".\nOpen the folder containing the screenshot now?", "Screenshot saved",
455  MessageBoxButtons.YesNo) == DialogResult.Yes)
456  {
457  Process.Start("explorer.exe", path);
458  }
459  }
460  }
461  catch
462  {
463  // ignored
464  }
465  }
466 
467  bmp.Dispose();
468  }

◆ UpdateVis0()

void BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.UpdateVis0 ( int  objectIndex,
int  drawCallIndex,
bool  value 
)
inline
776  {
777  BRESEntryNode n;
778  if ((n = TargetAnimation) == null ||
779  _animFrame == 0 ||
780  TargetModel == null)
781  {
782  return;
783  }
784 
785  Start:
786  if (_vis0 != null)
787  {
788  if (objectIndex < 0 || objectIndex >= TargetModel.Objects.Length)
789  {
790  return;
791  }
792 
793  MDL0ObjectNode obj = (MDL0ObjectNode) TargetModel.Objects[objectIndex];
794 
795  if (drawCallIndex < 0 || drawCallIndex >= obj._drawCalls.Count)
796  {
797  return;
798  }
799 
800  DrawCall c = obj._drawCalls[drawCallIndex];
801  MDL0BoneNode bone = c._visBoneNode;
802 
803  if (bone == null)
804  {
805  return;
806  }
807 
808  VIS0EntryNode node = null;
809  if ((node = (VIS0EntryNode) _vis0.FindChild(bone.Name, true)) == null && bone.BoneIndex != 0 &&
810  bone.Name != "EyeYellowM")
811  {
812  node = _vis0.CreateEntry();
813  node.Name = bone.Name;
814  node.MakeConstant(true);
815  }
816 
817  bool ANIMval = value;
818 
819  bool nowAnimated = false, alreadyConstant = false;
820  Top:
821  if (node != null)
822  {
823  if (node._entryCount != 0) //Node is animated
824  {
825  bool VIS0val = node.GetEntry(_animFrame - 1);
826 
827  if (VIS0val != ANIMval)
828  {
829  node.SetEntry(_animFrame - 1, ANIMval);
830  }
831  }
832  else //Node is constant
833  {
834  alreadyConstant = true;
835 
836  bool VIS0val = node._flags.HasFlag(VIS0Flags.Enabled);
837 
838  if (VIS0val != ANIMval)
839  {
840  node.MakeAnimated();
841  nowAnimated = true;
842  goto Top;
843  }
844  }
845  }
846 
847  //Check if the entry can be made constant.
848  //No point if the entry has just been made animated or if the node is already constant.
849  if (node != null && !alreadyConstant && !nowAnimated)
850  {
851  bool constant = true;
852  for (int i = 0; i < node._entryCount; i++)
853  {
854  if (i == 0)
855  {
856  continue;
857  }
858 
859  if (node.GetEntry(i - 1) != node.GetEntry(i))
860  {
861  constant = false;
862  break;
863  }
864  }
865 
866  if (constant)
867  {
868  node.MakeConstant(node.GetEntry(0));
869  }
870  }
871 
872  VIS0EntryNode t = (VIS0EntryNode) KeyframePanel.visEditor.TargetNode;
873  if (node != null && t != null && t.Name == node.Name)
874  {
875  VIS0Editor.UpdateEntry();
876  }
877  }
878  else
879  {
880  CreateVIS0();
881  if (_vis0 != null)
882  {
883  goto Start;
884  }
885  }
886  }

◆ SelectedBone

virtual IBoneNode?? BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.SelectedBone
getset
630  {
631  get => _selectedBone;
632  set
633  {
634  if (_selectedBone != null)
635  {
636  _selectedBone.BoneColor = _selectedBone.NodeColor = Color.Transparent;
637  }
638 
639  bool boneSelected = (_selectedBone = value) != null;
640  if (boneSelected)
641  {
642  _selectedBone.BoneColor = Color.FromArgb(0, 128, 255);
643  _selectedBone.NodeColor = Color.FromArgb(255, 128, 0);
644  }
645 
646  //Check if the user selected a bone from another model.
647  if (EditingAll && boneSelected && TargetModel != _selectedBone.IModel)
648  {
649  _resetCamera = false;
650  TargetModel = _selectedBone.IModel;
651  }
652 
653  BonesPanel?.SetSelectedBone(_selectedBone);
654 
655  if (TargetAnimType == NW4RAnimType.CHR && KeyframePanel != null)
656  {
657  KeyframePanel.TargetSequence =
658  _chr0 != null && _selectedBone != null ? _chr0.FindChild(_selectedBone.Name, false) : null;
659  }
660 
661  OnSelectedBoneChanged();
662  UpdatePropDisplay();
663  }
664  }

◆ VertexLoc

Vector3? BrawlLib.Internal.Windows.Controls.ModelViewer.MainWindowBase.ModelEditorBase.VertexLoc
getset
555  {
556  get
557  {
558  if (_selectedVertices == null || _selectedVertices.Count == 0)
559  {
560  return null;
561  }
562 
563  if (_vertexLoc != null)
564  {
565  return _vertexLoc;
566  }
567 
568  Vector3 average = new Vector3();
569  foreach (Vertex3 v in _selectedVertices)
570  {
571  average += v.WeightedPosition;
572  }
573 
574  average /= _selectedVertices.Count;
575  return _vertexLoc = average;
576  }
577  set
578  {
579  if (VertexLoc == null)
580  {
581  return;
582  }
583 
584  if (value == null)
585  {
586  return;
587  }
588 
589  if (_moveVerticesWithVertexLoc)
590  {
591  Vector3 previous = VertexLoc.Value;
592  Vector3 diff = value.Value - previous;
593  foreach (Vertex3 v in _selectedVertices)
594  {
595  v.WeightedPosition += diff;
596  }
597  }
598 
599  _vertexLoc = value;
600  }
601  }
